title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
description: Below you will find answers to the most frequently asked questions about the MRP system.

general1.question: How can I change the interface language?
general1.answer: You can change the interface language in user settings. Click on your avatar in the top right corner and select your preferred language from the available options.

general2.question: How do I report a bug in the system?
general2.answer: To report a bug, click the "Report Bug" button at the bottom of the sidebar menu. You can describe the problem, attach a screenshot, and include console logs to help resolve the issue faster.

production1.question: How do I create a new production task?
production1.answer: Go to Production → Production Tasks and click the "New Task" button. Fill out the form by selecting a recipe, quantity, and planned completion date.

production2.question: How do I edit a recipe?
production2.answer: Go to Production → Recipes, find the recipe in the list, and click the edit icon. You can modify ingredients, their proportions, and production instructions.

inventory1.question: How do I check inventory levels?
inventory1.answer: Go to Inventory → Stock to see the current inventory status of all materials. You can filter by category, location, or search for a specific product.

inventory2.question: How do I add a new purchase order (PO)?
inventory2.answer: Go to Inventory → Component Orders and click "New Order". Select a supplier, add items from the catalog or manually, set dates, and confirm the order.

orders1.question: How do I create a customer order (CO)?
orders1.answer: Go to Sales → Customer Orders and click "New Order". Select a customer, add products, set quantities and delivery dates, then save the order.

orders2.question: How do I generate an invoice?
orders2.answer: Go to Sales → Invoices. You can generate an invoice based on a customer order or create one manually by filling in all required fields.
